content.question: Which of the following expressions best represents the speed of the two pucks after the collision?

choices.label: <math alttext="one half v sub B" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle displaystyle="true"><mfrac><mn>1</mn><mn>2</mn></mfrac><msub><mi>v</mi><mi mathvariant="normal">B</mi></msub></mstyle></math>

<math alttext="three fourths v sub B" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle displaystyle="true"><mfrac><mn>3</mn><mn>4</mn></mfrac><msub><mi>v</mi><mi mathvariant="normal">B</mi></msub></mstyle></math>
<math alttext="v sub B" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle displaystyle="true"><msub><mi>v</mi><mi mathvariant="normal">B</mi></msub></mstyle></math>

<math alttext="three halves v sub B" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle displaystyle="true"><mfrac><mn>3</mn><mn>2</mn></mfrac><msub><mi>v</mi><mi mathvariant="normal">B</mi></msub></mstyle></math>

content.answer: <math alttext="three fourths v sub B" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle displaystyle="true"><mfrac><mn>3</mn><mn>4</mn></mfrac><msub><mi>v</mi><mi mathvariant="normal">B</mi></msub></mstyle></math>

skill.text: 2.A: Derive a symbolic expression from known quantities by selecting and following a logical mathematical pathway.
